f : about 100 bones .
m : no , there are actually 206 bones .

f : i think bones give us the ability to stand , walk and run .
m : great . actually , they have 2 important functions . one is to provide a structure that enables humans to stand upright instead of moving along the ground . the other is to protect the inside of the body . so , how can you keep your bones healthy ?
